sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef, useContext } from 'react'; import { Navbar, Nav, Container, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { ScreenSizeContext } from '../App'; const DropdownMenu = ({ setIsShown, parallax }) => { const ref = useRef(parallax); const { isTabletOrMobile } = useContext(ScreenSizeContext); return ( <> {!isTabletOrMobile ? setIsShown(false)}>

ref.current.current.scrollTo(1)}>About Me

ref.current.current.scrollTo(2)}>My Work

ref.current.current.scrollTo(3)}>Contact

 :

ref.current.current.scrollTo(1)}>About Me

ref.current.current.scrollTo(2)}>My Work

ref.current.current.scrollTo(3)}>Contact
} ) }; export default DropdownMenu;
